name: singapore-math-monorepo
description: Singapore Math platform with Knowledge Graph Pipeline

scripts.kg:ingest: cd services/kg-pipeline && poetry run process-inbox process
scripts.kg:status: cd services/kg-pipeline && poetry run process-inbox status
scripts.kg:query: cd services/kg-pipeline && poetry run process-inbox query
scripts.kg:lint: cd services/kg-pipeline && poetry run ruff check src/
scripts.kg:format: cd services/kg-pipeline && poetry run black src/
scripts.install:all: npm run web:install && npm run kg:install
